long_description: Shimano TR32 Bike Shoes give triathletes and road riders a fast entry, sockless comfort and efficient strokes to snag a place on the podium on race day. Supple synthetic-leather uppers have breathable mesh panels for moisture control. Reversed strap closure and heel strap, as well as strap position-keeper, add up to a faster entry. Quick-dry interior provides comfort without socks. Shimano TR32 Bike Shoes secure your feet in the ideal ergonomic position for a more efficient upstroke. Lightweight fiberglass-reinforced polyamide soles offer optimum sole rigidity. Compatible with a wide range of cleats; cleats not included.
short_description: Shimano TR32 Bike Shoes give triathletes and road riders a fast entry, sockless comfort and efficient strokes to snag a place on the podium on race day.
